<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_rte_eb_script_operation"><sys_rte_eb_script_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><conditional_fields/><conditional_script><![CDATA[/* Example Script
(function(batch, output) {
    for (var i = 0; i < batch.length; i++) {
        
        // step1: access the input variables
        var a = batch[i].input;

        // step2: your script code goes here
        // based on the input variables assign variable 'b' to true or false.
        var b = true; // or false;

        // step3: set the output for each element
        output[i] = b;
    }
})(batch, output);
*/
(function(batch, output) {

})(batch, output);]]></conditional_script><is_conditional>false</is_conditional><name>Script Operation - u_e_h_status</name><operation_group/><order>500</order><script><![CDATA[(function(batch, output) {
	for (var i = 0; i < batch.length; i++) {
		var input = batch[i].input; 

		var util = new x_exfo2_cmdb.EXFOStatusDictionary();
     
    var snValues = util.getSNValues(input);
     
     output[i] = snValues;
	}
})(batch, output);
]]></script><source_sys_rte_eb_field display_value="u_e_h_status">aed58f4e1b33f5506e86e0cb234bcb79</source_sys_rte_eb_field><source_sys_rte_eb_fields/><sys_class_name>sys_rte_eb_script_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>alex.frankel@exfo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-23 11:06:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>37180b1f1b7fb950da698666624bcb05</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Script Operation - u_e_h_status</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Graph Connector for EXFO" source="x_exfo2_cmdb">aa514eec877274103e867518cebb35ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_rte_eb_definition display_value="SG-EXFO Equipment Holders">956d36421b33f5506e86e0cb234bcbba</sys_rte_eb_definition><sys_rte_eb_entity display_value="temp">12d54f4e1b33f5506e86e0cb234bcb9f</sys_rte_eb_entity><sys_scope display_value="Service Graph Connector for EXFO">aa514eec877274103e867518cebb35ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_rte_eb_script_operation_37180b1f1b7fb950da698666624bcb05</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>alex.frankel@exfo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-23 11:06:34</sys_updated_on><target_sys_rte_eb_field display_value="u_e_h_status_1">7f18471f1b7fb950da698666624bcb6f</target_sys_rte_eb_field><target_sys_rte_eb_fields/><type display_value="Script Operation">941f88e273b333002b6265a751ab9e84</type><use_unique_input_sets>true</use_unique_input_sets></sys_rte_eb_script_operation></record_update>
